message: Good day Bob, I'm pleased to offer you our premium product. Given its exceptional value, I'm confident that you'll find our price of $1450000 quite reasonable.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. However, considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $1300000 for the product. I believe this is a fair offer for both of us.

Hi Bob, thanks for getting back to me. I understand that you have budget constraints, but I believe the value of the product warrant a higher price than your last offer.  After careful consideration, I'm willing to lower my price to $1375000.

Thank you for your revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. To move us closer to an agreement, I would like to propose a price of $1325000. I hope this offer is closer to what you can accept.
